## SectionComponent type

A component that can be used to render a section template for vertical results.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SectionComponent = (props: SectionConfig) => JSX.Element | null;
```
<b>References:</b> [SectionConfig](./answers-react-components.sectionconfig.md)
